channel.title: [508/525] Will someone help me with npc dialouge?
channel.description: Im using interuppted 508/525 source and it has a captain barnabay tele you around places. Im trying to make another one of those but i cant figure out how. I figured out where you make the npc dialouge and how you make it tele. (npc option1 for dialouge and optionclicking for teles) only thing i cant figure out is how to pick the npc. Any help? And i also can't seem to get the interface to appear. That might be same thing but idk. =( Ill rep if you help

item.title: [508/525] Will someone help me with npc dialouge?
item.dc:creator: @cocky cocky
item.description:
@cocky wrote:

Umm… This is kind of a bump, but can u tell me how to add npcs all together, and then I’ll try finding out how to add npc dialouge.

Read full topic
item.source: [508/525] Will someone help me with npc dialouge?
